paper_abstract: In this paper, we determine the general solution of the functional equation f(1)(kx + y) + f(2)(kx - y) = f(3)(x + y) + f(4)(x - y) + f(5)(x) for fixed integers k with k not equal 0, +/- 1 without assuming any regularity condition on the unknown functions f(1), f(2), f(3), f(4), f(5). The results improve and extend some recent results.
paper_title: A generalized mixed additive-cubic functional equation
